question:
On the playground at school during recess, Monica called Emily a chicken because _ was capable of climbing the ladder.
(1) Monica (2) Emily
answer:
A person is called a chicken when he is afraid to do something. A person is capable of doing something means he can do it. If a person is called a chicken because he is capable of doing something, it means he is afraid to do it. Since Monica called Emily a chicken because she was capable of climbing the ladder, it means Emily was afraid to climb the ladder. 
So the answer is: (1) Monica. 
</

question:
At the beauty salon, Angela preferred to work on her eyebrows instead of her eyelashes because the _ were already worked on.
(1) eyebrows (2) eyelashes
answer:
A person may work on her eyebrows instead of her eyelashes because her eyebrows are already worked on. 
So the answer is: (1) eyebrows. 
</
